channel.title: Programming on WIMMEL Portfolio Website
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on WIMMEL Portfolio Website

item.title: GraphWar Line Generation Program
item.description: Coded a python program to generate scaled piecewise equations that go through user-inputted click positions in the game Graph War.

item.title: Automatic Door Opening System
item.description: Collaborated with one of my peers to design and develop a sensor/arduino controlled automatic door system, reducing costs 90% compared to industry standards.
